comments.body:
I would like to see a doc fragment implemented here just to prevent duplication:
https://github.com/ansible/ansible/blob/devel/lib/ansible/utils/module_docs_fragments/zabbix.py. 

```yaml
extends_documentation_fragment:
    - zabbix
```

Would be nice to have `validate_certs` option as well. See zabbix_host module for details on both.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +36,40 @@    - zabbix-api
options:
    server_url:
        description:
            - Url of Zabbix server, with protocol (http or https).

comments.body: This is unnecessary as error checking is handled in `get_hosts_by_host_name` as well. I think you can remove it completely with the whole `is_host_exist` method to save a few lines of code. Basically you want to do the same as with `get_hosts_by_ip`.

This one is a bit odd as you are expecting that user will skip both `host_name` and `host_ip` arguments. In that case it is equal to not using your module at all. I would just replace with `fail_json`:

```yaml
module.fail_json(msg="No host name or IP provided")
```

Same goes for the line 235, but that should be removed with the whole `is_host_exist` check.
